title: StartifyAI
description:
StartifyAI – the AI-powered business strategist that helps you turn ideas into real, startups. Unlike other AI tools, StartifyAI doesn't just give you random advice—it builds a step-by-step business roadmap tailored to your goals.

 Validates your idea before you invest
 Finds your target audience & first customers
 Generates marketing,financial

StartifyAI is the first AI consultant that thinks like a real business strategist. No fluff—just real execution plans to get you from idea to launch 🚀
